name: 【IQ3でできるエロRPG】トレジャーハンターアンナ～新米アンナと処女の穴～
name_original: 【IQ3でできるエロRPG】トレジャーハンターアンナ～新米アンナと処女の穴～
description:
Important! There is a free demo version of this software.
Please download the demo version before buying the full version, because playing the demo version will help you understand the rules and volume of this game.


This is the first of a series of erotic RPGs made in Tuscourt that focuses entirely on H-scenes, aiming to be "a game that can be pulled off with IQ3".
This is the first game in the series that concentrates on H scenes. There are no troublesome level ups or long storylines in this game, so you can enjoy it as a game that you can start right away and get out of!

Synopsis.
A legendary dungeon that no one has ever stepped into before, commonly known as the "virgin hole" ......
In this game, you'll play as a young girl who's trying to find her way out of a dungeon.
Can Anna get through the monsters that are too strong to win at all and get the treasure of the lowest level safely? ......
If you lose to the enemy, you will be raped!

Game Features
Number of H scenes: 7 basic scenes + 1 differential scene
H scene voices: 13 loop voices + 4 climax voices
H-scene sound effects: 4 panting loops + 4 squealing loops + 1 ejaculation sound
H-scene cross-section: 7 types for each character *ON/OFF function under consideration
Endings: 3 types
Tedious level up: None
Long story: None
Serious world view: No
Naked wandering: Yes
Virginity Clear: Yes
